title: پاستا الفردو مرغ
description: A hearty and wholesome meal, inspired by the flavors of the countryside. Made with a combination of fresh ingredients, this dish features savory meats, crisp vegetables, and fluffy potatoes, all cooked to perfection.

title: سیب سوخاری دو نفره
description: A classic American burger topped with a sunny-side up egg, adding a touch of richness and flavor to the traditional dish. Served on a toasted bun with lettuce, tomato, pickles, onions, melted cheddar cheese, and special sauce.

title: سیب ویژه دو نفره
description: A dish that combines savory bacon with fluffy eggs and crispy potatoes. Packed with protein and flavor.
